attributes.review:
I was told that this app would help me connect with other reptilian homosexuals but all I see on there are sweaty, orange mammalians. Ew. 

At least they have cold, dead eyes. But in 2020 that’s just not enough for me to swipe right anymore.
attributes.title: Disappointing

attributes.review: Absolutely horrible! This was supposed to be an app to keep up to date with the president but all I see is a racist Cheeto who can’t speak correctly. Clearly that couldn’t be our leader.
attributes.title: Couldn’t be our leader

attributes.review: I am a Trump supporter but this app is absolutely awful. I downloaded it thinking I could use it to support daddy Tumpet but as soon as I opened it a laser shot out and obliterated my eye ball. This is completely unacceptable and I totally do not recommend!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!

attributes.title: My donkey flew away

attributes.review: My phone was fine before downloading this app, but now it keeps glitching. As soon as I open it freezes and then crashes. Kind of like the Trump administration’s response to the pandemic.
